name: help
description: Get an answer to any 'actual question'

conversation.human: Who was president of the United States in 1955?
conversation.bot: Dwight D. Eisenhower was president of the United States in 1955.

conversation.human: Which party did he belong to?
conversation.bot: He belonged to the Republican Party.

conversation.human: What is the square root of banana?

conversation.bot: Telescopes use lenses or mirrors to focus light and make objects appear closer.
The 1992 Olympics were held in Barcelona, Spain.
